name: FactoryFall
description:
The game is in early development so it has a lot of bugs

Basic mechanics, gamemodes and controls

MECHANICS

At the start of the match you are able to pick 2 weapons that you will be using for the rest of the game.  Weapons don't have right click for scope or something like that, it  can only just shoot.

The game has wallruns , double jumps and redirecs but the one that needs explanation is redirect. When you press redirect button it launches you into the direction you are pressing on a keyboard, so if you are pressing D it will launch you into right direction.

GAMEMODES

Before that, you can put your nickname and team in main menu before entering the game

The game has 3 gamemodes - DeathMatch, Team DeathMatch and  Bring The Recourse.Bring The Recourse is a gamemode similar to the Capture the flag. In this gamemode you have to dig the ore of the enemy team, to get the ore you have to hit it 3 times, if another player hits the ore it synchronizes its health among all players, after you got the recourse you have to bring it to giveaway point (which is marked on a minimap) and after you went into it you will get the points to your team, you can hold 3 resources at the time.

CONTROLS

move - WASD as usual
sprint - Shift
jump - Space
redirect - Right click

shoot - Left click
reload - R
arm punch - V
change weapon - 1, 2


How to play multiplayer via vpn

Lobby system  and matchmaking is in development, so to play multiplayer for this moment you have to use vpn's like Radmin VPN or Hamachi (better use radmin, but if it doesnt work use hamachi) to join to people or host for them.

(every step below is made in radmin but works the same in hamachi)

To play you have to create or join the network

MAKE SURE YOU ARE ONLINE IN THE VPN

to host the game you simply click host button and wait for others to join

to join to someone you have to right click on the person you want to join to and copy ip address (this is not your real ip adress so dont worry)

then in the game paste the ip address in the input field next to the client button

after that you click client button and join your frien :)
